data.title: STATUS QUO - Six Disc Live Album To Be Released In September
data.meta_description: Long-running UK rockers STATUS QUO will release a range of live material recorded on the Frantic Four Tour this past March which will be released this September. The cornerstone release is a six disc earBOOK that will contain all of the material that is to be released across the...
data.text:
Long-running UK rockers STATUS QUO will release a range of live material recorded on the Frantic Four Tour this past March which will be released this September. The cornerstone release is a six disc earBOOK that will contain all of the material that is to be released across the various formats (except the vinyl) which is available to pre-order now.

The release dates for all formats is September 14th.

Live At Wembley - Blu-ray / DVD

- Will feature the full show live from Wembley.

- Both formats will include a single CD of Wembley audio (selected tracks).

Live At Hammersmith

- A newly compiled and re-mastered double CD recorded live at Hammersmith, with audio taken from across the two shows on March 16th/17th

Live In Glasgow

- In a nod to the classic 1976 release Live!, a vinyl version will be released, taking the form of a double LP recorded, with audio taken from the two shows on March 9th/10th, also newly compiled and re-mastered.

The Limited Edition, single print run, earBOOK includes:

- Blu-ray and the DVD

- Two x CD Live at Hammersmith

- Single Wembley CD (from the Blu-ray and DVD packages)

- An exclusive disc of video extras filmed on tour and at rehearsals

The earBOOK itself boasts 120 lavish pages packed with outstanding photography from across the tour, both on and offstage, and rehearsals providing a real window onto the Frantic Four dates.

It was written by Ian Woods, Senior Correspondent for Sky News and features photography by original tour photographer Danny Clifford; both his vintage material and exclusive live and backstage material from the reunion shows.

Fans can actually become a part of this historic project too, anyone pre-ordering the book before the production date will get their name printed in it. Additionally the band is asking fans to share their favorite live Quo memories on the Status Quo Facebook page and elsewhere online using the hashtag #FranticFour - the best of which will be featured in the book itself.

To pre-order the package visit this location.
